snippet: Rivalry between communities, tending to induce emulation in moral, intellectual, or commercial advancement, is alike desirable and creditable. The success of either party in the honorable contest, should only serve to stimulate the other to renewe...
lead_paragraph: Rivalry between communities, tending to induce emulation in moral, intellectual, or commercial advancement, is alike desirable and creditable. The success of either party in the honorable contest, should only serve to stimulate the other to renewed effort. The great prize at the end of the race, is the peace, prosperity, and happiness of man.
